import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' export function StoreItem(id, name, price, imgUrl) { return ( {name} {formatCurrency(price)} {/* ms-2 margin so price is still visible with long name */}
{/* mt-auto ->fill all space available in the flex container, works with h-100 */} {quantity === 0 ? ( ) : (
{quantity} In Cart
)}
) }
